Hi Darren, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://shellshockedmedia.com/how-to-shine-on-camera-free-video/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

full_threads.body:
Hi,

The link you sent is not going to the right video.

It does send me to 'Get your Free video' which is what which sends me to the 'How to Shine on Camera FREE Video' but its the wrong video.



This is the correct link.

iPhone Flip
https://vimeo.com/1074489288?share=copy#t=0

Hi Darren, 

Thank you for providing the video link. I’ve located it and resolved the issue. Once the form is submitted, users will now be redirected to the video as intended.

Here is the link: 
https://shellshockedmedia.com/media-presentation-training-with-shelly-horton/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi Darren,

I've added the new video to the 4 Hour Media Training page.

You can view it here:
https://shellshockedmedia.com/4-hour-media-presentation-training/

Regarding the Get Your Free Video feature, we’re still looking into the best approach. In the meantime, could you please provide the link to the iPhone Flip video or send the video file itself?

HI,

Can the following video be added to the top of the '4Hour Media Training' page please

Media Training, Evelyn Ellis

https://vimeo.com/1074108801?share=copy#t=0

Also on the '1Hr Media & Presentation Training' page, when you fill out the red 'Get your Free video' box it is ment to send you the 'iPhone Flip' video?

Clients have said this is not happening.

Thank You.

Hi Darren,

I see, thank you for the clarification.

I have now updated the bottom video to Media Training, Australian Pork 2024.

Here's the link:
https://shellshockedmedia.com/4-hour-media-presentation-training/

Let me know if you need further assistance.

Hi,

My mistake, we now have 2 videos on the '4 Hour Media Training’ page that are titled ‘Media Training, Australian Pork 2025’

> Can we change the name of the video: 'Media Training, Australian Pork 2025' to 'Media Training, Australian Pork 2024’ please.

Just to be clear the video that requires the name change is at the very bottom of the page.

Thank You
